vinoteqa.title: Vinoteqa - Wine Cellar Management for Restaurants
vinoteqa.description: Vinoteqa is a digital platform for wine cellar management designed for high-end restaurants and wine bars. Digitalize your wine menu, manage inventory, and access detailed data to make informed decisions.
vinoteqa.mission: Vinoteqa's mission is to revolutionize wine management for high-end restaurants and wine bars with seamless, efficient, and elegant digital solutions.

hero.title: Digitalize Your Wine Cellar Management
hero.subtitle: The best way to manage and display your wine collection. Generate your wine list with one click. Accessible anytime, anywhere.

statistics.title: Gain immediate access to our database

features.integratedWorkflowSubtitle: Effortlessly manage your wine cellar with our intuitive platform. Control inventory, create stunning wine menus, and access reliable data.
features.extensiveWineDataSubtitle: Access over 1 Million wine data points, including territories, grapes, styles, and more.
features.intuitiveUISubtitle: Navigate with ease through a user-friendly interface designed for clarity and simplicity.
features.inventoryManagementSubtitle: Keep track of your entire cellar effortlessly, reducing the risk of out-of-stock surprises for your guests.
features.statisticsSubtitle: Discover a wealth of insights with our detailed wine cellar statistics, designed to help you understand and optimize your inventory and sales performance.
features.liveStatisticsSubtitle: Review your statistics anytime and from anywhere, ensuring you always know what you have in stock.
features.reportingSubtitle: Generate comprehensive inventory reports with ease, saving time and effort.
features.dataDrivenDecisionsSubtitle: Use insights to project profits, review margins, and identify best-sellers and key suppliers.
features.winelistSubtitle: Automatically update and organize your wine list with real-time inventory sync. Effortlessly create and print customized wine menus with wines placed in their correct positions.
features.digitalWinelistSubtitle: Keep your digital wine list current with automatic updates and synchronization. Once set up, wines will be automatically placed in their designated positions, reflecting your collection accurately.
features.digitalWinelistImgAlt: Vinoteqa's digital wine list on mobile and iPad
features.printWinelistSubtitle: Print your wine list with a single click, achieving high-quality results. Automatically organized and professionally presented, both digitally and in print.
features.printWinelistImgAlt: Restaurant's guests looking through a printed wine list automatically generated by Vinoteqa

testimonial.imgAlt: Stefano Kratter from Ristorante Mondschein talks about Vinoteqa
testimonial.content: Vinoteqa has revolutionized the management of our inventory and wine list. With wine data already available and real-time updates, our operations are efficient and the list is always up-to-date. Vinoteqa truly keeps our wine cellar at our fingertips, allowing us to focus on delivering an exceptional dining experience.

pricing.title: One simple Price for All Features
pricing.subtitle: Get Everything you need to Master your Wine Inventory and Wine List with a Single Plan.

custom.title: Custom

hardware.question: What hardware or software is required to use Vinoteqa?
hardware.answer: Vinoteqa is a cloud-based platform that requires only an internet connection and a modern web browser. No additional hardware or software is needed.

integrations.question: Can Vinoteqa integrate with my existing systems?
integrations.answer: Vinoteqa is a standalone inventory manager that handles sales and purchases. We offer personalized integrations with POS and PMS systems to enhance your existing setup.

setupFees.question: Are there any setup fees or hidden support costs?
setupFees.answer: Our pricing is transparent with no hidden costs. The onboarding fee covers setup, training, and initial support. Ongoing support is included in the annual license.

futureFeatures.question: Will updates affect my current setup or data and will I pay for new features?
futureFeatures.answer: Updates will not disrupt your current setup or data. All new features and updates are included in the annual license fee.

mobileApp.question: Is Vinoteqa available as a mobile app?
mobileApp.answer: Vinoteqa is available as a Progressive Web App (PWA), which means it is accessible through modern web browsers on any device and offers an app-like experience without needing a standalone mobile app.

onboarding.question: What does the onboarding process look like and how long does it take?
onboarding.answer: The onboarding process includes initial setup, importing your inventory, and comprehensive training. Most customers are up and running within a week or two.

users.question: Who can use Vinoteqa in my restaurant/hotel?
users.answer: Vinoteqa is designed for sommeliers, restaurant managers, and wine bar owners. Multiple users can access and manage the system.

onlyOnlineWinelist.question: Do I only get an online wine list from the software?
onlyOnlineWinelist.answer: Vinoteqa provides both digital and printable wine lists, allowing you to choose the best format for your establishment.
